comment: Raiser's Edge System Record IDs for the Actions relating to the Proposal being added.

fields.name: proposal_kwtid
fields.comment: Foreign key to proposals.

fields.name: n_houses
fields.comment: Proposed number of houses in the development plan.

fields.name: long_name
fields.comment: A long name of the Commercial Use Type for displaying in select options and filters.

fields.name: short_name
fields.comment: A short name of the Commercial Use Type for displaying in tables and headers.

comment: Broad types of Commerical use that may be part of a Proposal.
Types of opportunities in proposals for increasing biodiversity.

fields.name: name
fields.comment: Descriptive name for the Outcome Type.

fields.name: rating
fields.comment: Percentage value to describe the level of success of an Outcome Type.

comment: Types of Outcome following KWT's input on a proposal.

fields.name: outcome_type_kwtid
fields.comment: Foreign key to outcome_types.

fields.name: description
fields.comment: Description of the Example Outcome.

comment: Illustrative examples for each Outcome Type, to help categorise Outcomes for KWT's Position on the proposal.

fields.name: short_name
fields.comment: A short name of the Proposal Type for tables and headers.

fields.name: long_name
fields.comment: A longer name of the proposal type for select options and filters.

fields.name: re_name
fields.comment: The name of the relevant value included in the custom table 'Proposal Type' in Raiser's Edge.

comment: Broad category for the type of planning proposal.

fields.name: update_kwtid
fields.comment: Foreign key to updates.

fields.name: concern_type_kwtid
fields.comment: Foreign key to concern_types.

comment: Selected Concerns about risk to biodiversity included in an Update on KWT's position towards a proposal.

fields.name: proposal_kwtid
fields.comment: Foreign key to proposals.

fields.name: commercial_use_type_kwtid
fields.comment: Foreign key to commercial_use_types.

fields.name: name
fields.comment: Name of the Concern Type.

comment: Types of concern that KWT may have about a proposal.

fields.name: site_name
fields.comment: A name that the planning team refer to the site by.

fields.name: proposal_type_kwtid
fields.comment: Foreign key to proposal_types.

fields.name: reference
fields.comment: Planning reference in the format KCC/MA/0074/2022.

fields.name: is_archived
fields.comment: Setting this to TRUE hides the proposal by default in the app.

fields.name: created
fields.comment: Time when the proposal was first added in to the app.

fields.name: updated
fields.comment: Time when the proposal was last updated.

fields.name: geom
fields.comment: Proposal boundary.

fields.name: description
fields.comment: A free text description of the Proposal.

comment: Planning applications, Nationally Significant Infrastructure Projects (NSIPs) and Strategic Development Allocations which are of interest to KWT.

fields.name: proposal_kwtid
fields.comment: Foreign key to proposals.

fields.name: comment
fields.comment: Any comments about the update.

fields.name: created
fields.comment: Time when the update was added to the app.

fields.name: position_date
fields.comment: Date when KWT's position was decided.

comment: Recorded positions that KWT has taken about a proposal, and the subsequent outcome of the planning decision.

fields.name: update_kwtid
fields.comment: Foreign key to updates.

fields.name: opportunity_type_kwtid
fields.comment: Foreign key to opportunity_types.

comment: Selected Opportunities for biodiversity benefit included in an Update on KWT's position towards a proposal.
